name: Hill Climb 4x4 Jeep: Snow Road
description:
Drive 4x4 monster truck and start enjoying thrilling offroad jeep adventures. This time great driving opportunity for the vigo jeep lovers to drive 4x4 truck within hilly areas and snow mountains. Steer heavy trucks in hilly mountains and offroads. Its one of best mountain hill climbing game specially for hilux drivers.
Features:

- A physics simulated game
- Engine horse power can be upgraded
- Steering Wheel, Buttons and Tilting control with clutch systems
- 4x4 engine power can be enhanced
- Detailed cargo trucks
- It's free and can be played offline
- Snow tyres and snow chains can be applied to tyres
